effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 379,056 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 204,871.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Use: Bind a spectral essence to an enemy for 20 sec, causing allied attacks to heal for 30% of damage dealt, up to 1.8 million total healing.

When the essence expires or is removed early, the remaining healing bursts, healing up to 5 allies within 8 yds. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.
